timeline.message:
Fix mac check bug

Change-Id: If7df1f3906b334bdf82523a07f4a1fa040f729d3

Fix mac check bug

Change-Id: If7df1f3906b334bdf82523a07f4a1fa040f729d3

timeline.bodyText: The mac must be not empty here
timeline.author: javeme
javeme
javeme

replies.bodyText: There may be two kinds of join symbols in the mac address, ':' and '-', they are both valid. To avoid check failures due to symbol mismatches, so unified the symbol to '-'
replies.author: Linary

timeline.bodyText:
change to "The server's macs '%s' don't"
align with newLicenseException
timeline.author: zhoney
javeme

timeline.bodyText: keep origin message "The server's mac '%s' doesn't..."
timeline.author: javeme
